item.title: Snippet: To check if App is installed via TestFlight
item.description: Apple provides a way to validate receipts, related to that the follwing code snippet can be used to verify app is installed from TestFlight or not. func isInstalledFromTestFlight() -> Bool { guard let appStoreReceiptURL = Bundle.main.appStoreReceiptURL else { return false } return appStoreReceiptURL.lastPathComponent == "sandboxReceipt" } Related Validating Receipts with the App Store
